item.title: moodboard
item.dc:creator: sapna
item.content:encoded:
[aw2.set module.post_class='{{aw2.get module.slug}}_post' module.post_unique_class='{token}' /] [css.style] .[aw2.get module.post_unique_class/]{ .height-master { display:table; height:100px; width:100%; border:1px solid #eee; h4 { display:table-cell; vertical-align:middle; } } .height-master-text { display:table; height:50px; width:100%; border:1px solid #eee; h4 { display:table-cell; vertical-align: middle; } } h5 { margin-top:18px; } .col-centered { display:inline-block; float:none; margin-right:-4px; text-align:left; } } [/css.style]

Moodboard

Background Color Classes

brand-primary-bg

brand-secondary-bg

brand-third-bg

brand-fourth-bg

brand-fifth-bg

brand-sixth-bg

gray-darker-bg

gray-dark-bg

gray-bg

gray-light-bg

gray-lighter-bg

gray-white-bg

brand-success-bg

brand-info-bg

brand-warning-bg

brand-danger-bg

brand-white-bg

brand-black-bg

Text Color Classes

brand-primary

brand-secondary

brand-third

brand-fourth

brand-fifth

brand-sixth

brand-darker

brand-dark

gray

gray-light

gray-lighter

gray-white

brand-success

brand-info

brand-warning

brand-danger

brand-white

brand-black

Typography

Heading 1(h1)

Heading 2(h2)

Heading 3(h3)

Heading 4(h4)

Heading 5(h5)
Heading 6(h6)

Paragrapth text look like this

link text look like this

Fonts Palette

font-size-smallest Font Size =
font-size-smaller Font Size =
font-size-small Font Size =
font-size-base Font Size =
font-size-big Font Size =
font-size-large Font Size =
font-size-larger Font Size =
font-size-largest Font Size =
font-size-huge Font Size =
font-size-jumbo Font Size =
font-size-giant Font Size =

Line height classes

line-height-1 Line Height =
line-height-2 Line Height =
line-height-3 Line Height =
line-height-4 Line Height =
line-height-5 Line Height =
line-height-6 Line Height =
line-height-7 Line Height =
line-height-8 Line Height =
line-height-9 Line Height =
line-height-10 Line Height =

Font Weight classes

font-light Font Weight =
font-regular Font Weight =
font-medium Font Weight =
font-semibold Font Weight =
font-bold Font Weight =
font-ultrabold Font Weight =

Gap classes

[loop.gaps step=1 start=1 stop=10]
gap-[aw2.get gaps.index /]
[/loop.gaps]

Padding classes

[loop.pad start=1 step=1 stop=10]
pad-[aw2.get pad.index /]
pad-x-[aw2.get pad.index /]
pad-y-[aw2.get pad.index /]
[/loop.pad]

Buttons

item.title: echarts
item.dc:creator: amit
item.content:encoded:
option = {
    title : {
        text: 'Tasks Status',
        subtext: 'Counts',
        x:'center'
    },
    tooltip : {
        trigger: 'item',
        formatter: "{a} 
{b} : {c} ({d}%)"
    },
    legend: {
        orient: 'vertical',
        left: 'left',
        data: ['x','y','z','a','b']
    },
    series : [
        {
            name: 'Bingo',
            type: 'pie',
            radius : '55%',
            center: ['50%', '60%'],
            data:[
                {value:335, name:'x'},
                {value:310, name:'y'},
                {value:234, name:'z'},
                {value:135, name:'a'},
                {value:1548, name:'a'}
            ],
            itemStyle: {
                emphasis: {
                    shadowBlur: 10,
                    shadowOffsetX: 0,
                    shadowColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)'
                }
            }
        }
    ]
};
[env.set module.center.new]50%[/env.set] [env.set module.center.new]60%[/env.set] ====
[template.set_array option title.text='Tasks Status' title.subtext= 'Counts' title.x='center' /] [template.set main="option.backgroundColor"]#ffffff[/template.set] [template.set_array option tooltip.trigger='item' /] [template.set option.tooltip.formatter]{a}
{b} : {c} ({d}%)[/template.set] [template.set data="x,y,z,a,b" /] [template.set_array option legend.orient='vertical' legend.left= 'left' legend.data= '{template.data.comma}' /] [template.set_array option.series.new name='Bingo' type='pie' radius='55%' /] [template.set option.series.last.center.new]55%[/template.set] [template.set option.series.last.center.new]60%[/template.set] [template.set_array option.series.last.data.new value='335' name='x' /] [template.set main="option.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ffeeff[/template.set] [template.set_array option.series.last.data.new value='310' name='y' /] [template.set main="option.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ff00ff[/template.set] [template.set_array option.series.last.data.new value='235' name='z' /] [template.set main="option.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#0000ff[/template.set] [template.set main='option.itemStyle.emphasis.shadowBlur']10[/template.set] [template.set main='option.itemStyle.emphasis.shadowOffsetX']0[/template.set] [template.set main='option.itemStyle.emphasis.shadowColor']rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)[/template.set] [env.dump template.option /] [env.dump template.option.json_encode /]
====== 
option = {
    title : {
        text: '南丁格尔玫瑰图',
        subtext: '纯属虚构',
        x:'center'
    },
    tooltip : {
        trigger: 'item',
        formatter: "{a} 
{b} : {c} ({d}%)"
    },
    legend: {
        x : 'center',
        y : 'bottom',
        data:['rose1','rose2','rose3','rose4','rose5','rose6','rose7','rose8']
    },
    toolbox: {
        show : true,
        feature : {
            mark : {show: true},
            dataView : {show: true, readOnly: false},
            magicType : {
                show: true,
                type: ['pie', 'funnel']
            },
            restore : {show: true},
            saveAsImage : {show: true}
        }
    },
    calculable : true,
    series : [
        {
            name:'半径模式',
            type:'pie',
            radius : [20, 110],
            center : ['25%', '50%'],
            roseType : 'radius',
            label: {
                normal: {
                    show: false
                },
                emphasis: {
                    show: true
                }
            },
            lableLine: {
                normal: {
                    show: false
                },
                emphasis: {
                    show: true
                }
            },
            data:[
                {value:9, name:'rose1'},
                {value:3, name:'rose2'},
                {value:4, name:'rose3'},
                {value:1, name:'rose4'},
                {value:0, name:'rose5'}
            ]
        },
        {
            name:'面积模式',
            type:'pie',
            radius : [30, 110],
            center : ['75%', '50%'],
            roseType : 'area',
            data:[
                {value:9, name:'rose1'},
                {value:3, name:'rose2'},
                {value:4, name:'rose3'},
                {value:1, name:'rose4'},
                {value:0, name:'rose5'}
            ]
        }
    ]
};
====
[template.set_array option2 title.text='Tasks Status' title.subtext= 'Counts' title.x='center' calculable='true'/] [template.set main="option2.backgroundColor"]#ffffff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2 tooltip.trigger='item' /] [template.set option2.tooltip.formatter]{a}
{b} : {c} ({d}%)[/template.set] [template.set data="'rose1','rose2','rose3','rose4','rose5','rose6','rose7','rose8'" /] [template.set_array option2 legend.x='center' legend.y= 'bottom' legend.data= '{template.data.comma}' /] [template.set_array option2 toolbox.show='true' toolbox.feature.mark.show='true' toolbox.feature.restore.show='true' /] [template.set main="option2.toolbox.feature.dataView.show"]true[/template.set] [template.set main="option2.toolbox.feature.dataView.readOnly"]false[/template.set] [template.set main="option2.toolbox.feature.magicType.show"]true[/template.set] [template.set main="option2.toolbox.feature.magicType.type.new"]pie[/template.set] [template.set main="option2.toolbox.feature.magicType.type.new"]funnel[/template.set] [template.set main="option2.toolbox.feature.saveAsImage.show"]true[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.new name='Bingo' type='pie' label.normal.show='false' label.emphasis.show='true' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.roseType"]radius[/template.set] [template.set option2.series.last.radius.new]20[/template.set] [template.set option2.series.last.radius.new]110[/template.set] [template.set option2.series.last.center.new]25%[/template.set] [template.set option2.series.last.center.new]50%[/template.set] [template.set main="option2.series.last.lableLine.normal.show"]false[/template.set] [template.set main="option2.series.last.lableLine.emphasis.show"]true[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='335' name='rose1x' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ffeeff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='310' name='rose2y' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ff00ff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='235' name='rose3z' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#0000ff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='310' name='rose4y' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ff00ff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='235' name='rose5z' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#0000ff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.new name='Bingo2.0' type='pie' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.roseType"]area[/template.set] [template.set option2.series.last.radius.new]30[/template.set] [template.set option2.series.last.radius.new]110[/template.set] [template.set option2.series.last.center.new]75%[/template.set] [template.set option2.series.last.center.new]50%[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='335' name='rose1x' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ffeeff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='310' name='rose2y' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ff00ff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='235' name='rose3z' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#0000ff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='310' name='rose4y' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#ff00ff[/template.set] [template.set_array option2.series.last.data.new value='235' name='rose5z' /] [template.set main="option2.series.last.data.last.itemStyle.normal.color"]#0000ff[/template.set] [env.dump template.option2 /] [env.dump template.option2.json_encode /]
====== 
option = {
    tooltip: {
        trigger: 'item',
        formatter: "{a} 
{b}: {c} ({d}%)"
    },
    legend: {
        orient: 'vertical',
        x: 'left',
        data:['x','y','z','a','b']
    },
    series: [
        {
            name:'bingo',
            type:'pie',
            radius: ['50%', '70%'],
            avoidLabelOverlap: true,
            label: {
                normal: {
                    show: false,
                    position: 'center'
                },
                emphasis: {
                    show: true,
                    textStyle: {
                        fontSize: '30',
                        fontWeight: 'bold'
                    }
                }
            },
            labelLine: {
                normal: {
                    show: false
                }
            },
            data:[
                {value:335, name:'x'},
                {value:310, name:'y'},
                {value:234, name:'z'},
                {value:135, name:'a'},
                {value:1548, name:'b'}
            ]
        }
    ]
};



app.title = '嵌套环形图';

option = {
    tooltip: {
        trigger: 'item',
        formatter: "{a} 
{b}: {c} ({d}%)"
    },
    legend: {
        orient: 'vertical',
        x: 'left',
        data:['a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','I','j']
    },
    series: [
        {
            name:'Inner',
            type:'pie',
            selectedMode: 'single',
            radius: [0, '30%'],

            label: {
                normal: {
                    position: 'inner'
                }
            },
            labelLine: {
                normal: {
                    show: false
                }
            },
            data:[
                {value:335, name:'I', selected:true},
                {value:679, name:'j'},
                {value:1548, name:'h'}
            ]
        },
        {
            name:'Outer',
            type:'pie',
            radius: ['40%', '55%'],
            avoidLabelOverlap:true,
            label: {
                normal: {
                    formatter: '{a|{a}}{abg|}\n{hr|}\n  {b|{b}：}{c}  {per|{d}%}  ',
                    backgroundColor: '#eee',
                    borderColor: '#aaa',
                    borderWidth: 1,
                    borderRadius: 4,
                     shadowBlur:3,
                     shadowOffsetX: 2,
                     shadowOffsetY: 2,
                     shadowColor: '#999',
                     padding: [0, 7],
                    rich: {
                        a: {
                            color: '#999',
                            lineHeight: 22,
                            align: 'center'
                        },
                        // abg: {
                        //     backgroundColor: '#333',
                        //     width: '100%',
                        //     align: 'right',
                        //     height: 22,
                        //     borderRadius: [4, 4, 0, 0]
                        // },
                        hr: {
                            borderColor: '#aaa',
                            width: '100%',
                            borderWidth: 0.5,
                            height: 0
                        },
                        b: {
                            fontSize: 16,
                            lineHeight: 33
                        },
                        per: {
                            color: '#eee',
                            backgroundColor: '#334455',
                            padding: [2, 4],
                            borderRadius: 2
                        }
                    }
                }
            },
            data:[
                {value:335, name:'a'},
                {value:310, name:'b'},
                {value:234, name:'c'},
                {value:135, name:'d'},
                {value:1048, name:'e'},
                {value:251, name:'f'},
                {value:147, name:'g'},
                {value:102, name:'h'}
            ]
        }
    ]
};

item.title: delete-revisions
item.dc:creator: amit
item.content:encoded: [templates.add main] [mysqli.fetch.rows o.set=template.rows] SELECT ID FROM `wp_posts` where post_type ='revision' and date(post_modified)<date('20191101') limit 10000; [/mysqli.fetch.rows] [loop.@x template.rows.rows] [mysqli.multi.cud o.set=template.ack] set session transaction isolation level read uncommitted; delete from wp_posts where ID = '[env.@x.item.ID /]' and post_type ='revision' and date(post_modified)<date('20191101'); delete from wp_postmeta where post_id = (select ID from wp_posts where ID = '[env.@x.item.ID /]' and post_type ='revision' and date(post_modified)<date('20191101')); [/mysqli.multi.cud] [/loop.@x] [template.rows.echo /] [/templates.add]

item.title: aw editor
item.dc:creator: amit
